meanings.sent1: The bacteriocide destroyed all the harmful bacteria in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use bacteriocide to treat infections caused by bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled bacteriocide on the bacteria, causing them to disappear instantly.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a powerful bacteriocide, wiping out any doubts in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The bacteriocide worked like magic, eradicating the bacteria completely.

meanings.sent1: The bacteriocide of the cleaning solution was evident in the sterile environment.
meanings.sent2: Proper handwashing is crucial in the prevention of bacteriocide in hospitals.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's special power was the ability to perform bacteriocide with just a touch.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight acted as a natural bacteriocide, cleansing the surface of any harmful organisms.
meanings.sent5: The army of white blood cells launched a successful bacteriocide mission in the body.
